duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain T-SQL and SSIS/SSMS solutions for ETL processes
Work with large datasets, performing data manipulation and movement tasks
Contribute to ERP application development and integration, particularly with PeopleSoft and Azure environments
Collaborate in agile iterations, ensuring efficient and effective delivery of data solutions
Utilize data tools such as Visual Studio, SSIS, MSSQL for development and maintenance tasks
Apply critical thinking to all aspects of ETL development and data manipulation
Demonstrate knowledge and application of ERD Modeling and maintenance principles
Troubleshoot RDBMS architecture and data-related issues
Utilize data mining methods to extract insights and optimize data processes
